name: Ordensstaat Burgund
startIntroPart1: Your Fuhrer's decaying body is akin to his ideology. A carcass that is unsustainable for the earth you cling so dearly. The Aryan race has nothing to gain from this world you protect. But it's ashes... Let go of your fickle existence and take your place. Among us. The Gods of the new world. The Atomic Fire will purify this earth. The Unworthy wil perish, you will not survive our ascension.
declaringWar: For the Aryan race and world!
attacked: As you wish. You'll see the Aryans' wrath!
defeated: You just see the old dawn, then you'll see Burgund Erwacht!

name: Siberian Black League
startIntroPart1: Arise for the Great Trial! To crush the Teutonic hordes, fight and drive them back! Let's crush the mad invaders and save our mighty land, from rapists, thieves, and plunderers, these slaughterers of Russian men! The Black Germanic Eagle of Death shadowed our sacred land, but her spacious fields and streams they never shall again defile! Behold, Germanic Insanity! You now face your doom, the plague of Russia shall be driven to it's tomb! And noble wrath lead us to victory against the German scum! Arise, our mighty land, Arise for Great Trial!
declaringWar: THE GREAT TRIAL HAS BEGUN! JUSTICE AWAITS FOR YOU!
defeated: Russians' noble wrath shall boil like a wave!
uniques: [-15]% maintenance cost for nuclear weapons [in all cities]

name: Hyperborea
startIntroPart1: Let us face ourselves. We are Hyperboreans; We know very well how far off we live. As long as there is a sun, as long as there is a sword, a Hyperborean shall not surrender!
neutralHello: The sun is rising in the north.
hateHello: THE BLACK SUN IS RISING ABOVE ALL!

name: Greater Germanic Reich
startIntroPart1: For the 1000 year Reich. Heil Hitler!
attacked: So you want a war, then i,ll give you war
defeated: Don't let the noise that the world is about to start disorientate you. One day, the lies will fall under their own weight, and truth will triumph over them.  The hour will come in which we will be above all, clean and without guilt, like our faith and task were.

name: Siberian Black Army
startIntroPart1: The problem is the more difficult to solve that there are a good many individuals who are the same time 'Bandits' and 'Anarchists' -Georgi Plekhanov
defeated: The Anarcho Communist will take revenge!

name: Holy Russian Empire
startIntroPart1: The clock has struck midnight. Hail the nightmare. Remain calm. The regent endures. Alexei lives. The Holy Russian Empire shall endure. There is much to be done. God save Russia, for no one else can.
declaringWar: The clock has struck midnight. Hail the nightmare. Remain calm. The regent endures. Alexei lives. The Holy Russian Empire shall endure. There is much to be done. God save Russia, for no one else can.
attacked: As you wish. You'll see the Russians' wrath!
defeated: The Russians will take revenge for the holy empire!
uniques: [-20]% maintenance cost for nuclear weapons [in all cities]

name: Union of Soviet Socialist Republics
startIntroPart1: Trust the fact that history will judge events honestly and you will never have to be embarrassed for what your father did. On no account ever be one of those people who criticise but do not follow through their actions. Such people are hypocrites—weak, worthless people who do not have the power to reconcile their beliefs with their actions. I wish you courage, my dear. Be strong in the belief that life is wonderful. Be positive and believe that the Revolution will always win. I am convinced that a revolutionary consciousness will catch fire among our people.
defeated: Be strong in the belief that life is wonderful. Be positive and believe that the Revolution will always win.
neutralHello: Trust the fact that history will judge events honestly and you will never have to be embarrassed for what your father did. On no account ever be one of those people who criticise but do not follow through their actions. Such people are hypocrites—weak, worthless people who do not have the power to reconcile their beliefs with their actions. I wish you courage, my dear. Be strong in the belief that life is wonderful. Be positive and believe that the Revolution will always win.
uniques: [-15]% maintenance cost for nuclear weapons [in all cities]

name: Ordensstaat Polen
startIntroPart1: We're the Black Hunters, Black Bandits, we attack them all with no mercy. Our bullets shall pierce them all. They shall burn in our fire!
attacked: YOU MESS WITH A WRONG ENEMY!
defeated: WE BLACK HUNTERS AND BANDITS SHALL TAKE OUR REVENGE ON OUR ENEMIES!
